scripts.dist: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && npm run uglify && npm run build:hash
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o dist/bundle.js dist/bundle.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o dist/bundle-legacy.js dist/bundle-legacy.js
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && shx mkdir -p dist
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:css: shx mkdir -p dist && cleancss -o dist/main.css src/css/main.css
scripts.build:html: shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp src/*.html dist
scripts.build:assets: shx mkdir -p dist/assets && shx cp src/assets/* dist/assets/
scripts.preserve: npm run clean && shx mkdir -p dist && npm run build:assets
scripts.servedist: npm run dist && ws --hostname localhost -d dist -p 9090 -o --log.format stats
